body_html:
That's definitely important information, thanks!

Perhaps either (1) my suggested rename, or (2) a rename to something like block_until_data_arrives(layout='parallel_stack') could still be made?

In addition to the clearer naming the limitation of the parallel vs sequential string option could of course still be documented.

Also, don't forget that I think there are still quite a few other pairs of ops which have similar names but differing functionality, I just chose parallel_stack as a good example!

body:
That's definitely important information, thanks! 

Perhaps either (1) my suggested rename, or (2) a rename to something like `block_until_data_arrives(layout='parallel_stack')` could still be made? 

In addition to the clearer naming the limitation of the `parallel` vs `sequential` string option could of course still be documented.

Also, don't forget that I think there are still quite a few other pairs of ops which have similar names but differing functionality, I just chose `parallel_stack` as a good example!
